item.title: With stock market concentration risk at peak, 'it's cash, precious metals, and then crypto' as new normal
item.description: A handful of mega-cap tech and AI stocks dominate the U.S. market, an imbalance that has investors looking to bigger hedges.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Super Micro, Knight-Swift, Wyndham, Las Vegas Sands, Hexcel and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: The Beyond Meat fever highlights the risk of trying to ride the meme trade wave
item.description: The violent swings underscored how quickly euphoria can turn to panic in these momentum-fueled trades.

item.title: The biggest crypto wipeout was led not by bitcoin, but much smaller tokens. Here's what happened
item.description: More than 1.6 million traders suffered a combined $19.37 billion erasure of leveraged positions over a 24-hour period beginning Friday, Oct. 10.

item.title: China to bolster consumption, tech development as U.S. tensions simmer
item.description: China's top leaders signaled their priorities for the next five years in a readout released Thursday at the end of a four-day meeting.
